lender.name: The Bucks
lender.loan_because: We want to help improve the world any way we can.

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: There is nothing better than helping others.
lender.occupational_info: I work with electronics for cars like speakers and radios. My job is to sell and sometimes help install these car electronics.

lender.name: Cyn Skyberg
lender.loan_because: I like to share
lender.occupational_info: I am the head of the HR department in a non-profit organization

lender.name: Cameron
lender.loan_because: to help others in need.
lender.occupational_info: I am an active participant of the third grade.

lender.name: chris
lender.loan_because: It enables and empowers people !

lender.name: Jan Terje
lender.loan_because: I love entreprenurship and want to support people

lender.name: Anders
lender.loan_because: I am curious to see how well Kiva works. I prefer to support people who have an intention to become self supported.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a server administrator and general "computer systems problem solver" at Aftenposten, one of the biggest newspapers in Norway.

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: I believe in small business.

lender.name: Krisanne & Darren
lender.loan_because: it's fun! And we like the idea of knowing how someone has been helped and passing it along to the next person.

lender.name: Abby
lender.loan_because: I'm from Vietnam and I'm adopted.

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: my day job is to invest in for-profit financial companies, so being able to participate in non-profit microfinance is refreshing
lender.occupational_info: I invest in growing financial services companies in North America on behalf of multi-national institutions.

lender.name: Joslyn
lender.loan_because: My sister Temperance encouraged me.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I'd like to contribute in a small way to helping a business get started

lender.name: Emma
lender.loan_because: people need to help and suport each other when they can, and at this point in my life - I can.
lender.occupational_info: I work with students from all backgrounds to get a better education for themselves and their families.

lender.name: Supryia
lender.loan_because: I like to help people help themselves.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I want to make a positive change in this world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student seeking to find my path in life.

lender.name: Louis
lender.loan_because: After reading "Banker To The Poor: Micro-Lending and the Battle Against World Poverty" by Muhammad Yunus I was hooked. I believe in micro lending and want to be a part of this.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I want to help others pursue their dreams and make a better life for themselves. I love that one small action on my part can mean so much to someone I may never meet.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a volunteer at a local animal shelter. It's where people pets (dogs and cats mostly) that have been injured or hurt. We care for them and keep them save and help them find new, loving homes. I wok in a kitten nursery where newborn kitties who have no mama come in and we teach them how to heat and how to groom themselves to become full cats that people will want in their house. I also work with adult animals helping them learn to trust people and making sure they are healthy and comfortable while in our care with lots of food, exercise, playtime, and cuddling.

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: I co-founded an all-volunteer nonprofit dedicated to assisting the impoverished Bagishu people of eastern Uganda. I understand how much a relatively small amount of money can make a significant difference in someone's life.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I am an entrepreneur and want to help other entrepreneurs succeed.
lender.occupational_info: Negotiating Petroleum rights in Canada

lender.name: Dan & Tilly
lender.occupational_info: Dan is aerospace engineer who helps regulate the aviation industry in the united states. Tilly has a background in trade but also works in the music industry.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: Making environments to deliver healthcare.

lender.name: Cam
lender.loan_because: Micro-finance programs play a key role in abolishing poverty and creating resilient communities.
lender.occupational_info: Suit and Tie kinda stuff.

lender.name: Rose
lender.loan_because: we're all connected.
lender.occupational_info: Learning.

lender.name: Barbara and Stephan
lender.loan_because: We like to see our money really being used and not just collecting interest. Everyone deserves a helping hand.
lender.occupational_info: We own a young chai company in Oregon

lender.name: andrew
lender.loan_because: i want to help change the world.

lender.name: Rikki
lender.loan_because: My big heart and compassionate soul finds priceless happiness in seeing people accomplish goals through hard work and passion.
lender.occupational_info: I help people achieve their dreams and follow their own path to happiness. I also like to lend a helping hand when I see the opportunity.

lender.name: Russell
lender.loan_because: Other people are in more need than me. I support Hemp Out because marijuana doesn't have to be a gateway drug.
lender.occupational_info: Help people with drug problems.

lender.name: Jorge Blanco
lender.loan_because: I want to be of service to others, and if whatever money I have got can help me with that the better.

lender.name: Marco
lender.occupational_info: Deal with computers and mobile devices.. :-)

lender.name: Marie
lender.loan_because: I think micro-loans are a great way to help other people. I like the 'teach a person to fish' quote, and I try to follow that in my donations/loaning.
lender.occupational_info: I deal with numbers - tracking the money through a company, helping the company see how it is spending it's money. I knit for fun - mostly scarfs, baby blankets, etc.

lender.name: Liz & Mark
lender.loan_because:
I love.
John 10:10

lender.name: NancyG
lender.loan_because: A great opportunity to help others around the world who are less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I work with people around the world who are employed by a large financial services corporation. I am responsible for business recovery planning and crisis management.

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: I believe that the dignity of human existence should and must be enabled and supported by the means to achieve it. Lending via kiva facilitates that support and helps lift people out of the poverty that robs them of some of there human dignity. Also for the kids. they need to see their parents and elders make their way productively through life so they know how to do it when it becomes their turn.
lender.occupational_info: I am an electrical Control system engineer working on Large industry projects in Mining , Power and Energy in Western Australia.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I want to help others achieve thier dreams.

lender.name: Malin
lender.loan_because: I feel so privileged in this world, so it feels only natural to help others. While I also donate a lot to charity, I feel that by giving microloans, I'm helping others to help themselves. That's making a difference that really lasts.

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: It is an honor to help others reach their goals.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: I have visited Central Asia and see that the men leave for Russia to work, sometimes never returning to their wives. Now they have to support their families and I admire their pride and their resourcefulness. I want to help them succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I perform in concerts, make recordings and teach children to play my instrument.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I received a gift voucher this christmas and thought what a fabulous idea!
lender.occupational_info: I teach children 11-18 years old how to cook, clean and about nutrition

lender.name: Caitlin
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I like to see hard workers with good ideas succeed.

lender.name: B.J.
lender.loan_because: I feel this is the most effective way to support growth and prosperity around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I transport packages and documents to Alaska towns in airplanes.

lender.name: Josh
lender.loan_because: I want to help others to rise above their current circumstances.

lender.name: Peter the Shepherd
lender.loan_because: I want to live a good life and it helps knowing that I at least tried to help my fellow man and woman...
lender.occupational_info: I am a simple shepherd on the island Gotland in the Baltic Sea.

lender.name: Jeanine
lender.loan_because: God has and continues to bless me with what I have, so I want to share the blessings with others.

lender.name: Michele & Alan
lender.loan_because: This world is built on the backs of hard working people. I loan because I want people to succeed. Succeeding breeds happiness and self respect. The world can never have enough of that.

lender.name: Johan
lender.loan_because: It is a good cause to develop healthy businesses and a working financial system.

lender.name: Gary & Edith
lender.loan_because: It seems to be the right thing to do.

lender.name: Derek
lender.loan_because: God tells us that He's blessed us not so that we might squander our blessings for our own selfish enjoyment, but that we would bless others and that we ourselves would be blessings, as a way that people would see how much God loves them... that they would draw near to God and love and be loved as we were created to do...
lender.occupational_info: Though my background was in molecular biochemistry/immunology, I work for a company that secures and protects information on computers, networks and over the Internet...

lender.name: teresa
lender.loan_because: I like to feel connected to the rest of the world...and I have been very fortunate and am able to share a bit with others.
lender.occupational_info: I help people solve problems.

lender.name: Pr-Ola
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Anders
lender.loan_because: I think it is important that people willing to work should be able to get started without having to pay high interest!
lender.occupational_info: I manage the computer network group at the technical university in Stockholm. I also work a little with network projects in developing countries like Burkina, Vietnam, Cambodia, Etiopia, Sri lanka, Rwanda, Tanzania.

lender.name: Erik
lender.loan_because: I think it makes a difference

lender.name: Hans
lender.loan_because: If I can help out with a small loan then I should. I try to share when it's needed.
lender.occupational_info: I work mainly with computers in a larger company.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help people that want to learn how to help themselves. I like the idea of a loan rather than a gift because it builds a sense of responsibility and gratitude. If we all help a little, we can do a lot.
lender.occupational_info: I train experienced teachers to improve their skills and keep learning even though they are older.

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: I can. We are very privileged in my country with lots of opportunities when it comes to education, work and social safety nets. This is my way of paying it forward.
lender.occupational_info: I see to it that the products of my company are safe to use, reliable and durable by controlling the manufacturing process and the finished product.

lender.name: Cheryl
lender.loan_because: I like being connected to people all over the planet.
lender.occupational_info: I am a potter and have a clay studio in my home. I also teach pottery.

lender.name: Jan
lender.loan_because: I'm ashamed of how our representatives treat the third world people. Life has been good to me.
lender.occupational_info: Occupied tout a l'heure. Rewarding, frustrating. Never bored.

lender.name: Leif
lender.loan_because: I feel this is a marvellous opportunity for us in the richer countries to help individuals in the less fortunate countries.

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because: A very small loan can make such a big difference in these people's lives - What seems like a very small $ amount to me - a BIG difference for others.
lender.occupational_info: I help people save some of their regular earnings, to grow for future needs. People save so that they might have emergency cash reserves for a crisis, to help educate their children, and to provide an income when they are too old to work.

lender.name: Brandy
lender.loan_because: bcoz i want to put a little business so i could stop doing some sex shows in the net

lender.name: Marko
lender.loan_because: Being born in Sweden and living in North-Western Europe, I am very fortunate. This fortune, I try to share in the ways I can, and micro finance seems to be one good way.
lender.occupational_info: Freelance journalist and photographer. I have previously worked with aid in the Middle East (Gaza and the West Bank) and with peace-keeping in the Balkans. Also with election observation.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I am very proud of the people who want to run their own business (good luck)!
lender.occupational_info: I sell insurances. If your house burns down or your car is total loss, we pay the damage.

lender.name: Anki
lender.loan_because: because I really like the idea of Kiva

lender.name: Roland
lender.loan_because: Find it as a good thing to loan to people who have own ideas to develop and make it possible for them to get a new start.
lender.occupational_info: Working with own company within telefoni and administration of pensionfund.

lender.name: Jonas
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Asa
lender.loan_because: I can, and believe in the idea of balance the money over the globe. From where it can be spared to where it's needed and well used.

lender.name: Dan
lender.occupational_info: I play and restore early keyboard instruments. Mostly new instruments but built like they were made in the 17:th and 18:th century.

lender.name: Lovisa
lender.loan_because: I believe that most people are competent to support themselves, but sometimes they need a chance to get started.
lender.occupational_info: My ambition is to teach the students things that will be useful in their lives.

lender.name: Bjrn
lender.loan_because: I believe in entrepreneurship - and if I get the opportunity to help others I'll do it

lender.name: Birgitta
lender.loan_because: I think it is the best way, to help people to help themselves

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I can. My life is thanks the work of my husband and the loan from a bank. I can pass that onto someone else who works hard. It makes me happy. It is a marvelous example to my son.

lender.name: Karima
lender.loan_because: I've been lucky to be born in a rich country! Therefore I feel I need to give a little help to someone that hasn't been as fortunate as myself. Also, it's very inspiring to learn about entrepreneurs all over the world!

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: It accords with my humanist beliefs.
lender.occupational_info: Peforming weddings namings and funerals for the non-religious

lender.name: Margareth
lender.occupational_info: I'm an artist, some kind of pacifistic artist. I use the power of art to make a change, to help those I met that want to say something important to make a change. I use to stop by and made some illustration or photography to give a support. I try to use my gift to do something of value.

lender.name: Oscar
lender.loan_because: A cow in Peru is better than a flat screen TV in Sweden.

lender.name: Anne & daughters
lender.loan_because: It is an excellent way of paying it forward!

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: Capital needs to move! I'm fortunate enough to make some money online so I share a portion of that through Kiva.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: I would absolutely appy for a loan if I was in the opposite position. Therefore I need to contribute when I am fortunate to be in a position where I can lend money. It could very easily be the other way around.
lender.occupational_info: My head in the clouds, but my feets firmly stuck in the ground.

lender.name: Susann
lender.loan_because: Easy way to help someone improve their life

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I believe this system makes a real difference! What a great idea! I love the way you actually see the difference happening!
lender.occupational_info: I teach kids all they need to know.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.occupational_info: Graduate student in computer science, researching mobile learning, mobile health, and sustainable transportation.

lender.name: Ingvar
lender.loan_because: I have more money than I need. Other have less.

lender.name: Mattias
lender.loan_because: A little from here becomes a big help there.
lender.occupational_info: I help new companies understand what they want to do and existing companies be better at what they do.

lender.name: Emil
lender.loan_because: I finally found a good way to help.

lender.name: Lars
lender.loan_because: Do anything are better than talking about everything.

lender.name: Annie
lender.loan_because: it is so easy.
lender.occupational_info: I raise 2 children, several goats, and a flock of chickens and ducks.

lender.name: Martin Menyes
lender.loan_because: I want to help people in the third world to develop and go through with their ideas. With Kiva I get a chance to help entrepeneurs all over the world to create a better future for themeselves and the people around them. The idea is to help the countries in the third world to develop and build an infrastructure to help the inhabitans of today and the next-coming generations to a better life. This is a way to show that the people we are helping CAN and WILL change their and others lives for the better.

lender.name: Takaharu
lender.loan_because: Now is the time to do something for the World!

lender.name: THERRON
lender.loan_because: I feel a need to help people around the world. I would rather help people through lending then receive gifts.
lender.occupational_info: I am a talented student with a passion for helping my community, and the larger world

lender.name: Darryl
lender.occupational_info: educator

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I'm grateful for the opportunities that I have been given in my life, and I want to do what I can to pass opportunity onto others.
lender.occupational_info: I teach young children with learning disabilities and strive to help them become successful and educated citizens.

lender.name: Nicklas
lender.loan_because: I think this is the best form of support for countries and people in need since it is (to a large extent )based on market principles.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher and researcher in economics, with a special interest in the establishment of retail firms in Sweden.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: we are all connected and have the same needs, wants and desires for independence and self-sufficiency.
lender.occupational_info: I teach 3 year old children. We learn about the world, play and sing.

lender.name: Bennert
lender.loan_because: It brings more joy to give rather than to receive.
lender.occupational_info: I research businesses to buy and then fix them to be more efficient, and then I resell them to new owners who operate them in the future profitably.

lender.name: Josh
lender.loan_because: God has richly poured out His love on me therefore since He gave I like wise can give

lender.name: Mattias
lender.loan_because: Its better to do something rather then nothing...

lender.name: Andrs
lender.occupation: iron safe manufacturer, lock expert, restorer
lender.loan_because: I want to produce 10 pieces of small iron safe, because as soon as they are ready already all of them would be bribed. Getting iron safes like this may not be nearly 10 of his years. I have 23 pieces of antique iron safe yet, I would like to restore them and to market. My works hits pictures on my web page.His rental sum: $4800
lender.occupational_info: I renew antique iron safes currently, I repair them. They touched the locking devices, I repair locks and keys prepare. Existing my iron safes I resume it and I market it on Hungary and into the neighbouring countries. Was already onto him example, that from the adjacent country called in, that let me fix their iron safe. There are banks, firms, doctors between my clients, lawyers. I would like to find a help in order for the work to go better. And I would like to produce iron safes like that that may not be already to bribe, there would be a claim though onto him. More are the claim, which I can produce, according to my surveys.

lender.name: Fagrell
lender.loan_because: I can. Our wealth is not ours - it belongs to the world community.
lender.occupational_info: Text, text and more text.

lender.name: Martin & Emelie
lender.loan_because: we can and want to...

lender.name: lin
lender.loan_because: I am a graduation university student,In order to pull achieves own undertaking goal,Achievement, help others
lender.occupational_info: I am an active in work

lender.name: Ricki
lender.loan_because:
What is $25 worth to me?
It is 11 weeks of buying a tv guide when I can get the information for free on the internet. It is 7 days of parking tickets when I drive my car to work instead of walking there in 20 minutes. It is 6 days of buying lunch instead of getting up ten minutes earlier in the morning and making lunch at home to take with me for a fraction of the cost. It is 2 books when I can borrow them from the library for free. It is 2 dvds when I have too many already. It is 1 computer game when I should interact more with people and less with electronics. It is 1 take away pizza when I have food in the house that will probably go out of date before it is eaten. It is 1 month of what I spend on chocolate.
I am lucky, I have a good paying job and little financial commitments. I can buy the food I want, I live in a secure environment, I have a comfortable home. I can give up the above luxuries and invest the money in someone who has not had the opportunities, the advantages and benefits that I have had.
It will not alter my life that much, and it will make me a better, healthier and more sociable person.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a university recruiting students and looking at applications.

lender.name: Johaneje
lender.loan_because: I care
lender.occupational_info: I build and run companies in sports, media and technology.

lender.name: Clare
lender.loan_because: I love this idea! What a great way to help each other
lender.occupational_info: I work for an Indian Tribe.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I believe entrepreneurs are great for any society.

lender.name: jean baptiste
lender.occupational_info: I play cards on the internet ;)

lender.loan_because: A fantastic way for my family to contribute to other people helping them self and their surroundings.

lender.loan_because: Kiva is a great idea

lender.name: Simmons Family

lender.name: Christina
lender.loan_because: To help someone help themselves.

lender.occupational_info: due to neck problems , i am no longer able to work outside of the home,

lender.occupational_info: I am currently working on energy savings for buildings. Did you know that a typical developed country uses 40% of its energy for buildings?! (60% is industry+transportation)

lender.name: brian
lender.loan_because: WoW!! What a deal. You get to help people and it doesn't cost you anything. Don't have that money siting in the bank when it can change lives.
